eng_before: but when I screamed for help,
I will give you some advice,
As for those of you who survive,
so we can put them to death

eng_after: and threw them into such confusion
your God, [then all will be well].

eng_before: Perhaps he is deep in thought,

eng_after: and to put it in writing
to the roofs of their mouths.
and my cry for His help
